markdownRemark.excerpt: There are small things that developers can do that can improve the overall UX and development time which do not require high expertise levels on user experience…
markdownRemark.html: There are small things that developers can do that can improve the overall UX and development time which do not require high expertise levels on user experience, these small things that when passed unnoticed can damage application’s overall experience, on the other hand, if you spend some time to look for these small things and correct them, it might improve your app’s user experience by a significant factor.

frontmatter.title: Things developers can do to improve the UX
